headline: BrainsWay Reports Cigna’s Evernorth Behavioral Health to Eliminate Prior Authorization Requirements for TMS Coverage, Accelerating Access to Care
summary: BURLINGTON, Mass. and JERUSALEM, Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- BrainsWay Ltd. (NASDAQ & TASE: BWAY) (“BrainsWay” or the “Company”), a global leader in advanced noninvasive brain stimulation technologies, today commented on the recent news issued by Evernorth® Behavioral Health, Inc., a division of the Cigna Group, which serves over 18 million covered lives across 12 states, that it will no longer require prior authorization for transcranial magnetic stimulation (TMS) for contracted providers

headline: FDA chief Marty Makary says 'everything should be over the counter' unless drug is unsafe or addictive
summary: Makary said the FDA is looking at prescription drugs like nausea medications and vaginal estrogen, and hopes to make changes this year.
